title: SimpleViewer Pro 1.9
description:
Simple and useful flash script for creating web photo galleries. Latest Pro version, including all the source files.
Latest changes:
- The ability to embed music files in the page
- Added "Back" button
- Autoplay function.
- Some others, check the website.
 <a href="
http://www.airtightinteractive.com/simpleviewer/pro/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.airtightinteractive.com/simpleviewer/pro/</a>

Can be combined with various automated scripts (Photoshop, Picasa etc.).

Highly customizable with Adobe Flash.
